byline.contributor: Jack Healy reported from Colorado Springs, and Erik Eckholm from New York.
byline.original: By JACK HEALY and ERIK ECKHOLM

abstract: Advanced security camera system at Planned Parenthood clinic in Colorado Springs, Colo, which helped police hunt down armed gunman holding center under attack and help rescue those inside, is just one of increasingly elaborate security measures abortion clinics around the country are implementing.
lead_paragraph: The advanced camera system at the Planned Parenthood, which helped officers during the siege, was just one sign of the increasingly elaborate security measures that have been adopted by abortion clinics around the country.

headline.main: Siege Highlights Security Used in Abortion Clinics
headline.print_headline: Cameras That Aided Police During Siege Highlight Security Used in Clinics

snippet: The advanced camera system at the Planned Parenthood, which helped officers during the siege, was just one sign of the increasingly elaborate security measures that have been adopted by abortion clinics around the country.
